amendment.description: Amendment provides student loan borrowers with the national average cohort default rate in addition to the institution's cohort default rate and the categorical national cohort default rate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in part B of House Report 113-546 to provide student loan borrowers with the national average cohort default rate in addition to the institution's cohort default rate and the categorical national cohort default rate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Hahn.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
